newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: PRESMED IN TALKS ON POSSIBLE ACQUISITION.
newsitem.headline: PRESMED IN TALKS ON POSSIBLE ACQUISITION.

text.p: President Medical Investments Ltd (PresMed) said on Wednesday an agreement in principle had been reached for it to acquire Lifecare Group Holdings acute care private hospital interests.

It said the final purchase price would be determined after a due diligence investigation was completed by November 20 and would paid for by the issue to Lifecare of sufficient PresMed shares at an issue price of 700 cents each.
In the event of the merger becoming unconditional, Lifecare would hold the shares as a long-term investment and would have representation on PresMed's board of directors, it said.
Shareholders were advised to exercise caution in their sharedealings until a further announcement was made.
